title: Colin sits down with Rob Parker to talk about his new podcast: Inside the (Rob) Parker
itunes:title: Colin sits down with Rob Parker to talk about his new podcast: Inside the (Rob) Parker
description:
Colin talks with Rob Parker about his new baseball podcast, "Inside the Parker" on The Herd Podcast Network.  They talk about the problems with being too analytically heavy and how the shift has really hurt the sport.  Plus, in this exclusive podcast Rob explains who he thinks is the best team in baseball and his answer may surprise you.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
